title: Canopy Park: Play and Dine At Jewel Changi
blurb: Enjoy a variety of leisure activities for everyone.
description: Canopy Park sits at the topmost level of Jewel Changi Airport, offering a variety of leisure attractions suitable for visitors of all ages. From bouncing on the Manulife Sky Nets to navigating the Canopy Maze, or simply relaxing amidst the lush greenery of the Topiary Walk, there's something for everyone. Dining options are also available within the park, allowing visitors to enjoy a meal while taking in the panoramic views. The park provides a unique blend of nature and entertainment, making it a memorable experience for families and individuals alike. It's a great place to spend time before or after a flight, or simply as a day out.
full_address: 78 AIRPORT BOULEVARD, SINGAPORE 819666 ©2024 JEWEL CHANGI AIRPORT DEVT PTE. LTD.

title: Walking Net - Jewel Changi Airport Attraction
blurb: Experience the thrill of walking high above ground.
description: The Walking Net at Jewel Changi Airport offers a unique and exhilarating experience for visitors of all ages. Suspended high above the ground, this attraction allows you to walk across a sturdy net, providing stunning views of the surrounding area. It's a thrilling adventure that combines fun and excitement with a touch of daring. Perfect for families and thrill-seekers alike, the Walking Net promises an unforgettable experience. Enjoy the sensation of floating in the air as you navigate this unique attraction. A safe and secure environment ensures that everyone can enjoy the experience to the fullest. The Walking Net is a must-visit destination for those seeking an adrenaline rush and breathtaking views.
datetime_display: Operating hours as per Jewel Changi Airport
full_address: 78 AIRPORT BOULEVARD, SINGAPORE 819666 ©2024 JEWEL CHANGI AIRPORT DEVT PTE. LTD.

title: Changi Experience Studio - Jewel Changi Airport
blurb: Discover the magic of Changi Airport through exhibits.
description: The Changi Experience Studio at Jewel Changi Airport offers an immersive and interactive experience for visitors of all ages. This attraction features a variety of exhibits that showcase the history, operations, and future of Changi Airport. Explore the exhibits and learn about the technology, innovation, and people that make Changi Airport one of the best in the world. Perfect for families and those seeking an educational and entertaining adventure, the Changi Experience Studio promises an unforgettable time. Enjoy the interactive exhibits and discover the secrets of Changi Airport. A safe and secure environment ensures that everyone can enjoy the experience to the fullest. The Changi Experience Studio is a must-visit destination for those seeking fun and excitement.

title: Canopy Park at Jewel Changi Airport Dining
blurb: Enjoy exclusive offers & deals at Jewel.
description: Explore a variety of dining options at Canopy Park, Jewel Changi Airport. From casual eateries to family-friendly restaurants, discover a range of culinary delights suitable for all ages. Enjoy special promotions and deals while experiencing the unique atmosphere of Jewel. Perfect for families looking for a convenient and enjoyable dining experience after exploring the attractions. With a wide selection of cuisines, there's something to satisfy every palate. Create lasting memories with your loved ones at Jewel Changi Airport's Canopy Park.

title: YOTELAIR Hotel in Asia for Relaxation
blurb: Relax, rejuvenate and be refreshed at YOTELAIR Hotel.
description: The YOTELAIR Hotel offers a place to relax and rejuvenate. It is the first YOTELAIR Hotel in Asia. Guests can find a comfortable space to refresh themselves before or after their travels. The hotel provides a convenient option for those looking for a short stay within Jewel Changi Airport. It is suitable for families and individuals seeking rest and relaxation during their time at the airport. The hotel offers various amenities to ensure a pleasant and comfortable stay for all guests. The hotel is designed to cater to the needs of modern travelers, providing a seamless and efficient experience.

blurb: Relax, rejuvenate and be refreshed at YOTELAIR Hotel.

title: Yotelair Singapore Changi Airport
blurb: A hotel inside Jewel Changi Airport for short stays.
description: YOTELAIR Singapore Changi Airport offers flexible booking options by the hour, ideal for short layovers or overnight stays. The hotel provides convenient access to Jewel's attractions and Changi Airport's terminals, making it a perfect spot for travelers seeking rest and rejuvenation during their journey.
